donor_name: UNITED NATIONS INTER-AGENCY SECRETARIAT FOR THE INTERNATIONAL STRATEGY FOR DISASTER REDUCTION.
outputs.output_descr:
-  Strengthened institutional capacities of the NDMC to develop systems and mechanisms for crisis prevention and risk reduction; including developed capacities for disaster preparedness and response at the national, atoll and island levels; enhanced capacities in undertaking scientific research on risk reduction issues and mainstreaming disaster management into development programmes
- Strengthened capacity of the MIDP unit of NDMC to effectively address IDP issues including; setting up appropriate coordination mechanisms, consultative processes for IDPs and facilitate integration of IDPs with the host communities through streamlined interventions
-  Developed capacities of island communities for effective management of disasters through building community awareness of disaster management concepts, preparation of contingency and preparedness plans at the island levels with specific priority to islands with IDPs

project_title: CAPACITY BUILDING FOR CRISIS PREVENTION AND RECOVERY
